alert.note: Alert for Delta; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 5:23PM EDT until June 28 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Delta County in south central Upper Michigan... Northeastern Menominee County in south central Upper Michigan... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 522 PM EDT/422 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Branche, or 18 miles west of Escanaba, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Escanaba and Gladstone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
